title: XData
extract: An XData block is a class member that consists of a name and a unit of data that you include in a class definition for use by the class after compilation. This chapter discusses XData blocks and covers the following topics: Basics. Using XData (XML example) Using XData (JSON example)
extract_html: An XData block is a class member that consists of a name and a unit of data that you include in a class definition for use by the class after compilation. This chapter discusses XData blocks and covers the following topics: Basics. Using XData (XML example) Using XData (JSON example)
